exclusion.criterion: Patients who are receiving any other investigational agents not included in this trial, within 21 days of the start of this trial and throughout the duration of this trial.

exclusion.criterion: Prior therapy for SMM with a proteasome inhibitor.

notes: The patient has symptoms consistent with Shiga-like toxin-producing E. coli (STEC) infection, which may be a contraindication to study enrollment.
